    Returns the list of loans associated with the customer.

    Methods in library with parameters of type Loan
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean Customer.addLoan​(Loan newLoan)
    Adds a new loan to the customer's list of loans.
    void Librarian.addToDatabaseLoan​(Loan loan, int customerId)
    Adds a loan to the database for the given customer.
    void Librarian.markBack​(Loan loan)
    Marks a loan as returned, updates its effective return date, and checks if it is late.
    void Customer.removeLoan​(Loan newLoan)
    Removes a loan from the customer's list of loans.
